column4: Currently I am doing a 1GB apt-get install but need to switch to a faster link as this one is horribly slow, can it be interrupted in anyway so that I may resume on a faster link?
if you interrupt a apt-get install midway, it resumes from the point it left.
its still at the download stage, and i dont have time to redownload all
the already downloaded content will not be downloaded again. it resumes apt-get handles it autometically
